text.0: this sage exalted by our lauds flows to the purifying cloth.
text.1: scattering foes as he is cleansed.
text.2: as giving power and winning light for indra and for vāyu he.
text.4: the men conduct him soma steer omniscient and the head of heaven.
text.5: effused into the vats of wood.
text.6: longing for kine longing for gold hath indu pavamana lowed.
text.8: this pavamana gladdening draught drops on the filtering cloth and then.
text.9: mounts up with sūrya to the sky.
text.10: to indra in the firmament this mighty tawny steer hath flowed.
